posts.title: Two-In-One Detachable Shower Head
posts.content: Improve the quality of your daily shower sessions by installing this two-in-one detachable shower head. The ingenious design gives you the choice of using it as a stationary shower head or as a more versatile handheld spray.

posts.title: Automatic Ping Pong Score Keeper
posts.content: Keep track of who’s in the lead with scientific accuracy by outfitting your table with this automatic ping pong score keeper. Two table sensors and an additional net sensor work together to detect the ball’s nano-vibrations and determine the score in real time.

posts.title: Centaur Santa Christmas Ornament
posts.content: He’s jolly, built like a mythical god, and doesn’t need red nosed reindeer to fly – he’s centaur Santa! This novelty Christmas ornament known as “Santaur” hangs on your tree, bare-chested and ready to dominate all other ornaments who question his greatness.

posts.title: Interlocking Coffee Mugs
posts.content: Steer clear of messes and spills by serving everyone’s drink into these interlocking coffee mugs. The functional design of these ceramic mugs allows you to link them together so you can carry them in one fast and easy trip.

posts.title: Oreo Dunking Spoon
posts.content: Say farewell to those sticky fingers next time you get your snack on using the Oreo dunking spoon. This unique utensil fits snuggly into the cookie so that you can conveniently soak it in delicious milk without making a mess or dropping it in the cup accidentally.

posts.title: Flexible Drill Bit Extender
posts.content: Complete jobs in hard to reach areas with tremendous ease using this flexible drill bit extender. This handy little add-on features a tough yet flexible stainless steel design that you can bend up to 90 degrees in any direction.

posts.title: Wreck This Journal
posts.content: Wreck This Journal is for anyone who’s ever wanted to start chronicling their life but didn’t know how to start. Its pages are filled with a prompts like “collect dead bugs here” and “place sticky things here” leaving you with a battered journal full of character when you finish.

posts.title: High Heel Protectors
posts.content: Wave goodbye to broken heels by placing the high heel protectors on your designer stilettos before heading out. These discreet and reusable heel protectors fit easily over the heel of the stiletto to ensure they remain structurally intact while strutting around town.

posts.title: Booze Prescription Flask
posts.content: Now you can gulp down 200 CCs of doctor recommended Boozemin and look like a medically prescribed drunk with this booze prescription flask. Capable of holding 7 ounces of alcohol, this novelty prescription flask makes a great gift idea for doctors.

posts.title: Hawaiian Punch Stash Can
posts.content: Transport valuables without attracting unwanted attention by storing them in the Hawaiian Punch stash can. While the exterior is indistinguishable from a regular can of delicious Hawaiian Punch, the hollowed-out interior serves as the ideal stash spot.

posts.title: Zombified Playing Cards
posts.content: Even after being bit by ravenous zombies, the game of cribbage refuses to die – it just morphs into the zombified playing cards. Each face card in the deck features gruesome art depicting the King, Queen, and Jack as eerily mindless zombies.

posts.title: Motion Activated Wildlife Camera
posts.content: Facilitate your wildlife scouting process by heading into the wilderness with this motion activated wildlife camera. This stealthy little camera comes in a sturdy waterproof casing and features a 14MP camera with a 120 degree wide angle lens, and a 75ft night vision distance.
